summary.span: 지정한 개체나 형식의 public 메서드를 호출합니다.

span.span: Calls a public method of a specified object or type.

Public ReadOnly Property GenericTypeArguments As Collection(Of Type)

span.span: The generic type arguments of the contained method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 호출된 메서드가 제네릭인 경우에만 제네릭 형식 인수를 설정해야 합니다.The generic type arguments must only be set if the called method is generic. ## Examples 다음 코드 샘플에서는 활동의 GenericTypeArguments를 설정하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.The following code sample demonstrates setting the GenericTypeArguments of an activity. 이 예제에서는 [InvokeMethod 활동을 사용 하 여](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/using-the-invokemethod-activity.md) 샘플.This example is from the [Using the InvokeMethod Activity](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/using-the-invokemethod-activity.md) sample. [!code-csharp[wfs_InvokeMethod#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wfs_invokemethod/cs/program.cs#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ MethodName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 활동이 실행될 때 호출할 메서드의 이름입니다.

span.span: The name of the method to be invoked when the activity executes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 호출된 메서드를 public으로 선언해야 합니다.The invoked method must be declared as public. ## Examples 다음 코드 샘플에서는 활동의 MethodName 속성을 설정하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.The following code sample demonstrates setting the MethodName property of an activity. 이 예제에서는 [InvokeMethod 활동을 사용 하 여](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/using-the-invokemethod-activity.md) 샘플.This example is from the [Using the InvokeMethod Activity](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/using-the-invokemethod-activity.md) sample. [!code-csharp[wfs_InvokeMethod#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wfs_invokemethod/cs/program.cs#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Parameters As Collection(Of Argument)

span.span: The parameter collection of the method to be invoked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 메서드 시그니처에 표시되는 것과 동일한 순서대로 컬렉션에 매개 변수를 추가해야 합니다.The parameters must be added to the collection in the same order that they appear in the method signature. 매개 변수 이름을 지정할 수 없습니다 `TargetObject` 또는 `Result`합니다.Parameters cannot be named `TargetObject` or `Result`. ## Examples 다음 코드 샘플에서는 활동의 Parameters를 설정하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.The following code sample demonstrates setting the Parameters of an activity. 이 예제에서는 [InvokeMethod 활동을 사용 하 여](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/using-the-invokemethod-activity.md) 샘플.This example is from the [Using the InvokeMethod Activity](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/using-the-invokemethod-activity.md) sample. [!code-csharp[wfs_InvokeMethod#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wfs_invokemethod/cs/program.cs#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool RunAsynchronously { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 활동의 메서드가 비동기적으로 호출되는지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져오거나 설정합니다.

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the activity’s method is invoked asynchronously.

remarks.format: ## Examples 다음 코드 샘플에서는 활동의 RunAsynchronously 속성을 설정하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.The following code sample demonstrates setting the RunAsynchronously property of an activity. 이 예제에서는 [InvokeMethod 활동을 사용 하 여](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/using-the-invokemethod-activity.md) 샘플.This example is from the [Using the InvokeMethod Activity](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/using-the-invokemethod-activity.md) sample. span.span: The object that contains the method to execute.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 이 매개 변수는 호출된 메서드가 정적인 경우에만 설정해야 합니다.This parameter must only be set if the invoked method is static. ## Examples 다음 코드 샘플에서는 활동의 TargetType 속성을 설정하는 방법을 보여 줍니다.The following code sample demonstrates setting the TargetType property of an activity. 이 예제에서는 [InvokeMethod 활동을 사용 하 여](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/using-the-invokemethod-activity.md) 샘플.This example is from the [Using the InvokeMethod Activity](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/using-the-invokemethod-activity.md) sample.
